accessories.Name: Rattan Lantern
accessories.Body:
This rattan lantern will add a warm glow to any setting.

Made of rattan and featuring a glass cylinder to hold candle.

Dimensions: 21cm diameter x 25 cm high

Please note candle not included.

accessories.Name: Rattan Handbags
accessories.Body: Material: Ata Grass (belongs to the family of the Rattan Palm) and Leather Meet our newly added chic rattan bag that has been lovingly handmade from indigenous wood in rural Bali. Round rattan bags with decoration are a must-have for bohemian lovers who also want to make a statement. Featuring fine batik lining, brown leather straps, and a button closure, this is a unique piece that will turn heads. Each carefully woven bag, which has gone through the process of hand weaving and drying on a coconut fire to arrive at it final color tells a story. We thank you for supporting and empowering the local Indonesian artisans by carrying this beautiful bag. Please Note: The bag is 100% handmade; therefore, the appearance and the size may vary slightly due to the handcrafted nature. Furthermore, the color of inside material may differ.

armchairs-occasional.Name: Isla chair VELVET Forest Green
armchairs-occasional.Body:
The Isla Accent Chair combines European style with velvet comfort. Featuring a webbed seat system with dark wooden legs, the Isla is available in a range of luxury colours, making it the perfect chair for any room where style is required.

Additional Information

Colour: Forest Green

Fabric: Velvet fabric

Heights: Seat height 510mm

armchairs-occasional.Name: Ringo Armchair
armchairs-occasional.Body:
The vintage cow leather Ringo Armchair is a stylish accent piece with vintage appeal. Available in charcoal, tan or ox blood, the solid, stylish wooden frame and feather filling blends form with function effortlessly. Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required lustre and handle. Specialised waxes and oils are hand applied to create a depth of colour and vintage patinas.

Additional Information 

Colour: Ox Blood

Leather: Vintage cow leather

Product Measurements: W750xD990xH810

armchairs-occasional.Name: Ringo Armchair

armchairs-occasional.Body:

Product Measurements: W910xD880xH970mm

bedroom.Name: Moa Tallboy
bedroom.Body:
The Moa Range will bring instant warmth and stylish tradition to your home.

Featuring solid pine and finished with a rich, walnut stain, this range of lounge, bedroom and dining furniture has a delightful, smooth finish and will suit a range of decor and settings. The sturdy tall boy features 4 drawers and offers plenty of stylish storage.

Product Measurements: L800xW440xH1150

A beautiful addition to any room

The sideboard features three cupboards, two drawers and the signature splayed legs. Pairs elegantly with the rest of the Hornbill Dining Range. Also available as lounge and bedroom ranges.

coffee-tables.Name: NEW - Kleo Nesting coffee table
coffee-tables.Body:
The "Contemporain"  collection of nesting coffee tables by Kleo have arrived. 

Made from reclaimed Boatwood with Powder-coated iron frames from Indonesia. Square and rectangle have wood tops with the nesting tables in a black painted wood. The round and smaller square feature natural wood inlay detailing in both coffee table and matching nesting table. 

These are stylish and functional, perfect for apartments or where you just want to save on space. Easy pull out side tables for when the friends turn up.

SQUARE  Coffee table + 2 Nesting side table

Dimensions:  W x D x H  (cm)

SQUARE  80 x 80 x 47   nesting tables 45x40

dining.Name: Stark Barstool
dining.Body:
If you’re looking for something a little different, the Stark Barstool is sure to spark a conversation. Featuring solid oak legs, a curved, black polypropylene seat and striking footrest, the vintage styling combined with modern elegance will have everyone talking.

dining.Name: Nashville Dining Table
dining.Body:
Retro lines meet industrial style in the Nashville Range. With its concrete veneer tops and antique iron legs, the look is versatile enough to suit a wide range of living and dining spaces. Both rectangular and round dining tables are the perfect match for the Nashville Dining Chair. The range includes a round dining table, lamp table, coffee table, console table, entertainment unit, sideboard and display cabinet.

Additional Information

Warranties: 2 Years

Product Measurements: L1600xW900xH7

dining.Name: Fantail Dining table
dining.Body:

dining.Name: Flynn Dining Chair
dining.Body:

Product Measurements: W440xD520xH870

dining.Name: Indonesian Boatwood Dining Chairs
dining.Body: Each chair is uniquely carved from former fishing boats out of the crystal waters of Indonesia. the variety from these chairs will bring a wonderful pop of colour to any bach or dining room.

dining.Name: Chicago barstool
dining.Body:
Sit back and relax in elegant sophistication on the Chicago Barstool. The vintage PU seat offers comfort and style, whilst the adjustable height makes getting on and off an absolute breeze. Bring a touch of class to your breakfast bar or dining room.

 

Colour: Charcoal / Black

Fabric: Vintage PU

Heights: Seat Height 600-810mm

dining.Name: Assembly Round Dining Table
dining.Body:
Create a modern dining setting with the Assembly Dining Table. The design features a precise and clean aesthetic with a slim plywood tabletop contrasted with black steel legs. The statement U-shaped legs connect to the floor with a discreet base plate and a tonal black rubber foot.

The Assembly table range offers something for every space with  rectangle and round options.

  • 1000 DIA x 720H

dining.Name: Flynn Dining Extendable Dining Table
dining.Body:
The Flynn Flip Top Dining Table combines sleek styling with slick versatility. Featuring a melamine extending table top with black, power coated legs, the extension folds neatly away when not in use. A perfect match for the Flynn Dining Chairs and guaranteed to bring any dining room to life.

 

Product Measurements: L1200-1600xW800xH750

Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required lustre and handle. Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required luster and handle.

lounge-sets.Name: Rattan Lounger Set
lounge-sets.Body:
A unique and stylish lounger available as a single lounger or two loungers and table set, designed for comfort and elegance. The hollow pattern of the rattan loungers, gives a visually appealing and modern look to any living area. The loungers and accompanying table are made from sustainable and environmentally friendly materials.

Dimensions: H x W x L mm Loungers: 850 x 600 x 2100 Tables: 450 x 700 x 700 Cushions included.

lounge-sets.Name: Outdoor Rattan Sofa and Table Set
lounge-sets.Body:
This luxurious Rattan sofa and table set would make a stunning centre piece to any living space, whilst also providing ample space to stretch out or entertain. This sofa and table set is made from environmentally friendly and sustainable materials.

Dimensions: W x D x H mm Bowl Sofa: 2000 x 800 x 900 White sofa cushion and glass table top included.

lounge-sets.Name: Outdoor Bamboo Lounger with stool
lounge-sets.Body:
Stylish bamboo lounger chair with a convenient pull out foot stool for when you need a little extra relaxation. These loungers have comfortable recline options and stowaway foot rest.
Dimensions: H x W x D mm Chairs: 900 x 680 x 800 Foot rest: 250 x 770 x 770 This set includes white cushions.

lounge-sets.Name: Outdoor rattan chairs and table
lounge-sets.Body: Modern loose weave Rattan chair and matching coffee table set. Perfect for outdoor and indoor settings, kick back, relax and enjoy your favourite book or great for entertaining. This set is made from environmentally friendly and sustainable materials. Dimensions: H x W x D mm Chairs: 800 x 850 x 800 Cushions and glass table top included.

lounge-sets.Name: Outdoor rattan lounger and stool set
lounge-sets.Body:
Funky rattan lounger & stool set. Unique and stylish (not to mention comfortable!), the hollow pattern gives a visually appealing and modern look to any living area.

Dimensions H x L x W Lounger: 87cm x 135cm x 60cm Stool: 47cm x 57cm x 60cm

Lounger padding is included.

Piece of mind - Feel good about your purchase knowing all of our items are ethically sourced direct from the manufacturer, and handcrafted from environmentally friendly and sustainable/repurposed materials! Not only that - your purchase will also benefit workers, families and small businesses across the globe (and help us to spread a little kindness as we go!).

modern.Name: Ringo Armchair
modern.Body:
The vintage cow leather Ringo Armchair is a stylish accent piece with vintage appeal. Available in charcoal, tan or ox blood, the solid, stylish wooden frame and feather filling blends form with function effortlessly. Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required lustre and handle. Specialised waxes and oils are hand applied to create a depth of colour and vintage patinas.

sale.Name: Plush Armchair
sale.Body:

sale.Name: Molly Leather Armchair - Charcoal
sale.Body:
The Molly Armchair delivers comfort, support and endless style. The vintage inspired design is crafted from a solid wooden frame and vintage cow leather seat and back. Subtlety reclined for laid-back comfort, this armchair is the perfect addition to any living space in need of some design flair.

Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required luster and handle.

Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required lustre and handle. Specialised waxes and oils are hand applied to create a depth of colour and vintage patinas. Available in tan, ox blood and charcoal.

Warranties: 2 Years

sale.Name: Large Indonesian Teak Coffee Table
sale.Body: This large re-purposed Teak Coffee Table will enrich your living space whether indoors or out. The sturdy wooden legs and tabletop show the character and grain of the wood, with a practical shelf underneath for storage. The natural wood pairs well with other rattan and bamboo furniture.

sale.Name: Round cabinet, Coloured & White washed available
Rattan Handbags
sale.Body: Material: Ata Grass (belongs to the family of the Rattan Palm) and Leather Meet our newly added chic rattan bag that has been lovingly handmade from indigenous wood in rural Bali. Round rattan bags with decoration are a must-have for bohemian lovers who also want to make a statement. Featuring fine batik lining, brown leather straps, and a button closure, this is a unique piece that will turn heads. Each carefully woven bag, which has gone through the process of hand weaving and drying on a coconut fire to arrive at it final color tells a story. We thank you for supporting and empowering the local Indonesian artisans by carrying this beautiful bag. Please Note: The bag is 100% handmade; therefore, the appearance and the size may vary slightly due to the handcrafted nature. Furthermore, the color of inside material may differ.

sale.Name: NEW - Kleo Nesting coffee table
sale.Body:

Made from reclaimed Boatwood with Powder-coated iron frames from Indonesia. Square and rectangle have wood tops with the nesting tables in a black painted wood. The round and smaller square feature natural wood inlay detailing in both coffee table and matching nesting table. 

These are stylish and functional, perfect for apartments or where you just want to save on space. Easy pull out side tables for when the friends turn up.

sale.Body:

Made from reclaimed Boatwood with Powder-coated iron frames from Indonesia. Square and rectangle have wood tops with the nesting tables in a black painted wood. The round and smaller square feature natural wood inlay detailing in both coffee table and matching nesting table. 

These are stylish and functional, perfect for apartments or where you just want to save on space. Easy pull out side tables for when the friends turn up.

SQUARE  Coffee table + 2 Nesting side table

Dimensions:  W x D x H  (cm)

SQUARE  80 x 80 x 47   nesting tables 45x40

living.Name: Ottoman Vintage Solid Pine frame
living.Body: This ottoman button top seat w/ storage is made to last. A perfect addition to any lounge, study, or living area, this ottoman in dark  brown shows off the warm tones of the leather and will compliment a wide variety of home décor.

living.Name: Sutherland 3 Seater
living.Body:
The stunning Sutherland Three Seater Sofa is the perfect addition to your mid-century, modern space. Supported by a solid wood frame, this 100% genuine vintage cow leather sofa strikes a streamlined silhouette with a pair of cushions for added comfort and metal legs. Only the finest Aniline leather hides are used to hand finish each piece and each one is subject to a seven stage hand treatment to achieve the required lustre and handle. Specialised waxes and oils are hand applied to create a depth of colour and vintage patinas. Available in tan, ox blood and charcoal.

Colour: Charcoal

Warranties: 2 Years

Fabric: Vintage cow leather

Product Measurements: L2200xW980xH800

stools.Name: Stark Barstool
stools.Body:
If you’re looking for something a little different, the Stark Barstool is sure to spark a conversation. Featuring solid oak legs, a curved, black polypropylene seat and striking footrest, the vintage styling combined with modern elegance will have everyone talking.
